attributes.action: ban the development/ opening of a Tesco store along Mill Road Cambridge
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Retail monster Tesco are attempting to ignore the views of local people, and open a store along Mill Road, Cambridge.

Such a development is deeply opposed in the area, and would have a negative impact on local traders and residents, along with overwhelming local infrastructure (roads).
